entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
